about_the_game:
This is a retro and stylish arcade action game that incorporates elements of traditional fighting action games and adds a protagonist growth system to give you the feel of playing arcade ARPG games.
The game will give you the same impact as STREETS OF RAGE, you can even operate any enemy and BOSS, just like in “SHADOW FORCE”, to experience the fun of turf wars. You can also rank up to challenge the title of "Final Fight" and compete for the fighting world king.
Story Mode: You will control the protagonist to save his daughter kidnapped by evil gangs, encounter various street thugs and bosses, and engage in fist-to-fist combat.
Territory Contest: You can control any enemy or BOSS you have encountered before to engage in fierce combat and compete for control of the territory.
Ranking Mode: The time has come to test your true level. In this mode you will encounter other players from around the world. Use victory to increase your rank and medals!
Vehicle: Various cool rides for you to drive
Weapons: A variety of weapons can be manipulated and upgraded
detailed_description:
This is a retro and stylish arcade action game that incorporates elements of traditional fighting action games and adds a protagonist growth system to give you the feel of playing arcade ARPG games.
The game will give you the same impact as STREETS OF RAGE, you can even operate any enemy and BOSS, just like in “SHADOW FORCE”, to experience the fun of turf wars. You can also rank up to challenge the title of "Final Fight" and compete for the fighting world king.
Story Mode: You will control the protagonist to save his daughter kidnapped by evil gangs, encounter various street thugs and bosses, and engage in fist-to-fist combat.
Territory Contest: You can control any enemy or BOSS you have encountered before to engage in fierce combat and compete for control of the territory.
Ranking Mode: The time has come to test your true level. In this mode you will encounter other players from around the world. Use victory to increase your rank and medals!
Vehicle: Various cool rides for you to drive
Weapons: A variety of weapons can be manipulated and upgraded
name: Street Thugz

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8.1,10,11
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo E4500 or equivalent,AMD athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 3600+ or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEforce 7300 GT(512MB)，Radeon X1300 Pro(256MB)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8.1,10,11
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo E6750 or equivalent,AMD athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5000+ or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEforce 8600 GT(512MB)，Radeon HD 4650Pro(1024MB)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Traditional arcade action fighting game, restoring the punchy impact of STREETS OF RAGE. Like SHADOW FORCE, you can control any enemy and BOSS in the game and compete for the title of Final Fight King.
